Tasks.Task Description: Use Azure Monitor and Application Gateway diagnostics to continuously monitor the health and status of the Application Gateway. Investigate any anomalies or potential issues.
Regularly verify the expiration dates of SSL certificates used in the Application Gateway. Renew certificates before expiration to avoid service disruptions.
Check the health of backend servers connected to the Application Gateway. Ensure that all servers are operational and responding to health probes.
Analyze performance metrics such as throughput, latency, and error rates to ensure the Application Gateway is operating within expected parameters.
Review and update Web Application Firewall (WAF) rules and security policies to adapt to new threats and vulnerabilities.
Conduct audits of Application Gateway configurations to ensure alignment with documented architecture and best practices.
Regularly back up the Application Gateway configuration to ensure quick recovery in case of accidental changes or failures.
Perform failover tests to verify that redundant paths and configurations function correctly during outages.
Keep Application Gateway service documentation up-to-date, including operational procedures, configuration details, and troubleshooting guides.
Perform regular compliance checks to ensure the Application Gateway setup adheres to relevant regulations and industry standards.
Conduct incident response drills to prepare the team for potential security incidents or Application Gateway outages. Ensure familiarity with procedures and protocols.
Evaluate the SLA performance of the Application Gateway connectivity provider. Address any issues or deviations from the agreed SLA metrics.
Develop and execute plans for Application Gateway upgrades or expansions as needed. Ensure minimal disruption during these activities.
Ensure the operations team participates in regular training to stay updated with new Application Gateway features, best practices, and security measures.
Collect and analyze user feedback regarding Application Gateway performance and reliability. Implement continuous improvements based on this feedback.
